Posts.EditableText: I may sound incredibly stupid, but where is the object tab in the web editor? This is the only thing I'm having trouble with. I started today and I'm having trouble figuring out how to make new objects. Thanks!
Posts.HTML: I may sound incredibly stupid, but where is the object tab in the web editor? This is the only thing I'm having trouble with. I started today and I'm having trouble figuring out how to make new objects. Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: To make a new object, just go to 'Add' at the top of the screen, or right click the room and choose 'Add object'.
Posts.HTML: To make a new object, just go to 'Add' at the top of the screen, or right click the room and choose 'Add object'.
